# CAM::ATTACH_CAM_TO_ENTITY

## Summary
Attaches a camera to an entity.

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** cameraIndex
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entityIndex:
The index of the entity to attach the camera to.
vecOffset: An additional offset to be applied from the attach position.
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetX
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetY
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetZ
* **BOOL** offsetIsRelative = true: If true, vecOffset is applied relative to the orientation of the attached entity, rather than in world-space.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Last param determines if its relative to the Entity
